title: Bronze 1 Duo, looking to get to Silver 5
body: Heys guys looking for a good player to help me get to silver before end of season tonight. currently on 34 lp, playing a game now so hopefully 50lp soon. i play at a silver level so looking for someone who is also bronze 1 or silver to help out. plat smurfs are also welcome haha.

replies.body: Yeah Bronze I, was on winning streak, earlier today got as high as 57LP, but then a series of losses got me demoted, so I've given up.
